evidence.claim: Direct Personal Care compliance with HIPAA regulations noted on their site.
Direct Personal Care mentions usage of FHIR standards for health data exchanges.
Direct Personal Care uses X12 transaction sets in healthcare data processing.
Direct Personal Care integrates with EHR systems as part of their service offering.
Direct Personal Care highlights their cloud data management systems, but no specific cloud services mentioned.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engaging in X12-based transactions or related API use cases.
